metadata.description: Adds Spacebot — an AI agent platform for teams and communities by Spacedrive, built in Rust with a React frontend. Uses concurrent specialized processes, integrates with Discord, Slack, Telegram, Twitch, and Webchat. No official Docker image — stack builds from source.
metadata.author: Antigravity

operations.description: Add Spacebot as a compose stack built from source (no official image available)

template.title: Spacebot
template.name: spacebot
template.description: AI agent platform for teams and communities by Spacedrive. Built in Rust with a React frontend. Uses concurrent specialized agent processes rather than a monolithic LLM thread. Integrates with Discord, Slack, Telegram, Twitch, and Webchat. Includes SQLite and LanceDB vector store for persistent memory and knowledge.

env.name: SPACEBOT_DIR
env.label: Data Directory
env.description: Persistent storage path inside the container (SQLite, LanceDB vector store, credentials, workspace).

env.name: SPACEBOT_DEPLOYMENT
env.label: Deployment Mode
env.description: Deployment context identifier. Set to 'docker' when running in a container.

template.note:
Spacebot nie posiada oficjalnego obrazu Docker ani docker-compose.yml w repozytorium. Stack wymaga zbudowania ze źródeł.

Dockerfile
FROM rust:bookworm AS builder
RUN apt-get update && apt-get install -y \
    protobuf-compiler cmake libssl-dev pkg-config curl unzip
RUN curl -fsSL https://bun.sh/install | bash
ENV PATH=/root/.bun/bin:$PATH
WORKDIR /app
RUN git clone --depth=1 https://github.com/spacedriveapp/spacebot .
RUN bun install --cwd frontend
RUN bun run --cwd frontend build
RUN cargo build --release --bin spacebot

FROM debian:bookworm-slim
RUN apt-get update && apt-get install -y \
    ca-certificates libsqlite3-0 curl bubblewrap && \
    rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*
COPY --from=builder /app/target/release/spacebot /usr/local/bin/
ENV SPACEBOT_DIR=/data
ENV SPACEBOT_DEPLOYMENT=docker
EXPOSE 19898 18789
VOLUME /data
CMD ["spacebot", "start", "--foreground"]

docker-compose.yml
services:
  spacebot:
    build: .
    container_name: spacebot
    environment:
      - SPACEBOT_DIR=/data
      - SPACEBOT_DEPLOYMENT=docker
    ports:
      - "19898:19898"
      - "18789:18789"
    volumes:
      - spacebot_data:/data
    restart: unless-stopped
    healthcheck:
      test: ["CMD", "curl", "-f", "http://localhost:19898/api/health"]
      interval: 30s
      timeout: 5s
      retries: 3

volumes:
  spacebot_data:

Konfiguracja (klucze API LLM, tokeny platform Discord/Slack/Telegram) odbywa się przez plik /data/config.toml po pierwszym uruchomieniu.
Port 19898 to API / health endpoint, port 18789 to serwis WebSocket.
